history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00588
FULL TITLE : AN ACT STRENGTHENING THE PHILIPPINE DRUG ENFORCEMENT AGENCY (PDEA) AND PROVIDING SUPPLEMENTAL DUTIES THEREOF, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE REPUBLIC ACT 9165, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE "COMPREHENSIVE DANGEROUS DRUGS ACT OF 2002"
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : BATAOIL, LEOPOLDO N.
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Catamco (007 2016-08-08)2. Savellano (024 2016-09-20)
3. Relampagos (040 2016-11-07)4. Alejano (095 2017-05-29)
5. Tambunting (000 2018-09-21)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:

          -Referred the measure for comment to the Philippine National Police Anti-Illegal Drugs Group
      2. Referred to Stakeholders on 2016-08-30
          -Referred the measure for comment to the Philippine Drug Enforcement Agency and the National Bureau of Investigation
      3. Referred to Stakeholders on 2016-09-06
          -Referred the measure for comment to the Department of Justice
